author: Albert Nigmatzianov <albertnigma@gmail.com>
message:
Don't write prefix and flags to counter

Small performance benefit:
name                     old time/op    new time/op    delta
LogPrintOnlyToCounter-4     310ns ± 4%     307ns ± 4%  -0.98%  (p=0.001 n=48+47)

name                     old alloc/op   new alloc/op   delta
LogPrintOnlyToCounter-4     20.0B ± 0%     20.0B ± 0%    ~     (all equal)

name                     old allocs/op  new allocs/op  delta
LogPrintOnlyToCounter-4      2.00 ± 0%      2.00 ± 0%    ~     (all equal)

In Go 1.9 the gain will be bigger because of https://github.com/golang/go/commit/4cf19fb5a73a33f838efe21b3baa14167469ac83
